features.text: Added controls to the bottom-right when inside the app.
features.reasoning: We've had a few requests to publish the controls somewhere. We thought this would be a good place for them!

features.text: Improved website responsiveness for mobile browsers (work in progress)
features.reasoning: While there aren't plans to make the application mobile-friendly at this time, the core website should still look decent regardless of your screen size.

features.text: Additional email notifications for changes related to your account.
features.reasoning: If your user data or subscription gets changed, we want to notify you just in case it wasn't you who requested the change.

bugs.text: Resolved occasional error message seen when deleting a block that had children.
Resolved subscription display bug when immediately revoking a given plan membership.

tweaks.text: Expanded blocks are now a consistent size (regardless of their depth) for easier readability.
tweaks.reasoning: This seems to go against the auto-scaling nature of the app, but more often than not I found myself needing to adjust my zoom whenever I expand a block. Now it should always be readable regardless of the zoom level.

tweaks.text: Moved release notes to the bottom-right corner.
tweaks.reasoning: You know what's better than a giant pop-up dialog when you log into Spacia? Pretty much anything. Hopefully the release notes are less disruptive in their new home.

tweaks.text: Improved wording of a few common error messages.
Bulk alignment tools now center the block stacks instead of top/left aligning them when their sizes differ.
Improved dragging behavior inside the app.
tweaks.reasoning: While dragging, if your mouse passed over certain areas (like dialog boxes), the drag would get interrupted and create a less-than-wonderful interaction. We've made some changes to resolve this issue for the most common culprits.
